alert.note: Alert for Delta; Hopkins (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued June 13 at 4:40PM CDT until June 13 at 9:00PM CDT by NWS Dallas-Fort Worth
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 745 PM CDT THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Urban and small stream flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...Delta and Hopkins counties * WHEN...Until 745 PM CDT. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - Doppler radar and automated rain gauges indicated heavy rainfall which will likely cause urban and small stream flooding. Low lying and/or poor drainage areas will experience minor flooding in the advisory area. Between 2 and 3 inches of rain have fallen. Additional rainfall amounts of 1 to 2 inches are possible. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Sulphur Springs, Cooper, Cumby, Cooper Lake State Park, Lake Sulphur Springs, Cooper Lake, Big Creek Lake, Klondike, Sulphur Bluff, Brashear, Saltillo, Pine Forest, Tira, Pecan Gap, New Birthright, Birthright, Peerless, Dike, Nelta and Charleston.
